name: Animal Hunt For Survival
description:
In Animal Hunt For Survival game shoot wild animals and become a best hunter. Hold your breath! Aim and shoot! in this Animal Hunt For Survival game have double packed action and simulation on which you have to drive 4x4 jeep and find the deer, wolf ,lions, rabbit, and other wild animals to shoot and survive
in dark forest.
If you are not best hunter in the jungle and dark forest. Then play this Animal Hunt For Survival game. Play on your style as you want to and show your power to hit these dangerous animals and also improve your shooting skills.

Animal Hunt For Survival: Features

Thrilling jungle environment
Deadly attack of wild animals
Smooth and realistic jeep controls
Realistic animations of attacking wild animals
Real lion roaring sounds to make you frightened
Simple and easy game play for beginner hunters
